name: collections::vec_deque::VecDeque::<T, A>::grow

collections::vec_deque::VecDeque::<T, A>.doc: Returns `true` if the buffer is at full capacity.

core::panicking::panic.doc: The underlying implementation of core's `panic!` macro when no formatting is used.

raw_vec::RawVec::<T, A>::grow_one.doc:
A specialized version of `self.reserve(len, 1)` which requires the
 caller to ensure `len == self.capacity()`.

collections::vec_deque::VecDeque::<T, A>.doc:
Frobs the head and tail sections around to handle the fact that we
 just reallocated. Unsafe because it trusts old_capacity.
